fields.description: The Education & Research category includes Co-Curricular Education, Curriculum, and Research sub-categories.
fields.title: Education & Research

fields.description: The Operations category includes Buildings, Climate, Dining Services, Energy, Grounds, Purchasing, Transportation, Waste, and Water sub-categories.
fields.title: Operations

fields.description: The Planning, Administration & Engagement section includes the subcategories Coordination and Planning, Diversity and Affordability, Human Resources, Investment, and Public Engagement.
fields.title: Planning, Administration & Engagement

fields.description: These credits recognize institutions that are seeking innovative solutions to sustainability challenges and demonstrating sustainability leadership in ways that are not otherwise captured by STARS.
fields.title: Innovation

fields.description: The Supplemental category includes reporting fields that are not part of STARS, but that have been requested by campus survey organizations (the Sustainable Endowments Institute, the Princeton Review, and Sierra magazine). Institutions that wish to share their data with one or more of these organizations should complete the Supplemental category in full or contact the relevant organization(s) for guidance regarding minimum reporting requirements.
fields.title: Supplemental
